summary: Ten strangers are invited to an island by a mysterious host, and start to get killed one by one. Could one of them be the killer?
cast: Maeve Dermody|Charles Dance|Toby Stephens|Burn Gorman|Aidan Turner|Harley Gallacher|Miranda Richardson|Paul Chahidi|Sam Neill|Charlie Russell|Tom Clegg|Noah Taylor|Catherine Bailey|Ben Deery|Rob Heaps|Douglas Booth|Celia Henebury|Joseph Prowen|Richard Hansell|Daisy Waterstone|Christopher Hatherall|Anna Maxwell Martin|Margot Edwards
title: Agatha Christie: Diez negritos
